details.title: Study on the improvements for the high-resolution frequency modulated continuous wave synthetic aperture radar imaging

kwd: high-resolution frequency modulated continuous wave synthetic aperture radar imaging

authors.affiliation: National University of Defense Technology, People's Republic of China
authors.name: Gaowei Jia

authors.affiliation: National University of Defense Technology, People's Republic of China
authors.name: Wenge Chang

details.abstract: This study develops two aspects of improvement, performing the range-dependent secondary range compression (SRC) and correcting the motion errors within the sweep of the transmitted signal, for the high-resolution frequency modulated continuous wave synthetic aperture radar (FMCW SAR). In cases of more complex imaging scenarios such as higher squint angle and larger range swath, the range dependence of SRC should be considered to avoid severe degradation. Moreover, when the trajectory deviations are severe, the motion error within the sweep causes new noticeable residual range cell migration, which should be considered for the motion compensation of FMCW SAR. Experimental results on the simulated and actual Ku-band SAR data proved that, for full swath and high squint mode FMCW SAR, the proposed approaches are valid and greatly helpful to improve the imaging quality.

ieee.title: Miniature high resolution FMCW SAR system
ieee.displayText: Wenge Chang, Haishan Tian, Xiangyang Li, "Miniature high resolution FMCW SAR system", Modern Circuits and Systems Technologies (MOCAST) 2016 5th International Conference on, pp. 1-4, 2016.

ieee.title: An efficient geometric distortion correction method for SAR video formation
ieee.displayText: Chengfei Gu, Wenge Chang, "An efficient geometric distortion correction method for SAR video formation", Modern Circuits and Systems Technologies (MOCAST) 2016 5th International Conference on, pp. 1-4, 2016.

ieee.title: The formation of high-resolution FMCW SAR video
ieee.displayText: Chengfei Gu, Wenge Chang, Xiangyang Li, Xinqun Luan, "The formation of high-resolution FMCW SAR video", Progress in Electromagnetic Research Symposium (PIERS), pp. 496-499, 2016.

ieee.title: The Analysis and Realization of Motion Compensation for Circular Synthetic Aperture Radar Data
ieee.displayText: Gaowei Jia, Wenge Chang, Qilei Zhang, Xinqun Luan, "The Analysis and Realization of Motion Compensation for Circular Synthetic Aperture Radar Data", Selected Topics in Applied Earth Observations and Remote Sensing IEEE Journal of, vol. 9, pp. 3060-3071, 2016, ISSN 1939-1404.

ieee.title: FMCW SAR: From design to realization
ieee.displayText: Wenge Chang, Haishan Tian, Chengfei Gu, "FMCW SAR: From design to realization", Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium (IGARSS) 2016 IEEE International, pp. 1122-1125, 2016, ISSN 2153-7003.

ieee.title: The generalized imaging processing for squinted FMCW SAR
ieee.displayText: Xiangyang Li, Gaowei Jia, Wenge Chang, Chengfei Gu, "The generalized imaging processing for squinted FMCW SAR", Radar Conference 2015 IEEE, pp. 364-368, 2015.

ieee.title: Focus Improvement for Squint FMCW-SAR Data Using Modified Inverse Chirp-Z Transform Based on Spatial-Variant Linear Range Cell Migration Correction and Series Inversion
ieee.displayText: Dong Li, Huan Lin, Hongqing Liu, Haowei Wu, Xiaoheng Tan, "Focus Improvement for Squint FMCW-SAR Data Using Modified Inverse Chirp-Z Transform Based on Spatial-Variant Linear Range Cell Migration Correction and Series Inversion", Sensors Journal IEEE, vol. 16, pp. 2564-2574, 2016, ISSN 1530-437X.
